messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Syndis on the shuttle. We're dealing with them. Red alert time.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Cunt Council, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Cunt Council door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
